issue.title: [Rust][DataFusion] Add pub fn ExecutionContext.tables()
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9427](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9427). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This allows users to know what names can be passed to `table(&str)`.
